column1: Kata Robata////Requested to be at the patio...very nice and more quiet than inside dining. Happy hour menu available until 630pm. We ordered fresh ceviche (pretty presentation
column3: fried brussell's sprouts (not quite as good as Uchi's but close)
column5: and spicy salmon roll. Everything came out on time except for the spicy tuna roll...we had to ask for them 2x and myself and a friend are almost done w our main dish before the salmon rolls my son ordered with the appetizers came out. I had the spicy soy ramen which never disappoints
column7: spiciness is moderate for my taste
column8: serving size is good enough for 2 people (esp after the appetizers).
